summary: This bill, H.R. 4728, introduced by Mr. Self, aims to codify Executive Order 14280. The Executive Order focuses on reinstating "commonsense school discipline policies." The bill was referred to the House Committee on Education and Workforce, as well as the Committees on the Judiciary, and Armed Services, indicating the subject matter's broad implications. The core of the bill proposes granting the force and effect of law to the specified Executive Order relating to school discipline.
